title: Google\Cloud\Language\V1\DependencyEdge
name: DependencyEdge
description:
Represents dependency parse tree information for a token. (For more information on dependency labels, see http://www.aclweb.org/anthology/P13-2017

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.language.v1.DependencyEdge

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.head_token_index
params.description: Represents the head of this token in the dependency tree. This is the index of the token which has an arc going to this token. The index is the position of the token in the array of tokens returned by the API method. If this token is a root token, then the head_token_index is its own index.

methods.name: getHeadTokenIndex
methods.description:

This is the index of the token which has an arc going to this token. The index is the position of the token in the array of tokens returned by the API method. If this token is a root token, then the head_token_index is its own index.

Generated from protobuf field int32 head_token_index = 1;
